question_id: Tampilkan setiap toko beserta total nilai pembayaran yang diterima sepanjang tahun 2006.
sql_query:
SELECT
    s.store_id,
    SUM(p.amount) AS total_nilai_pembayaran
FROM
    store s
JOIN
    staff st ON s.manager_staff_id = st.staff_id
JOIN
    rental r ON s.store_id = r.store_id
JOIN
    payment p ON r.rental_id = p.rental_id
WHERE
    YEAR(r.rental_date) = 2006
GROUP BY
    s.store_id
ORDER BY
    total_nilai_pembayaran DESC
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    s.store_id,
    SUM(p.amount) AS total_nilai_pembayaran
FROM
    store s
JOIN
    staff st ON s.manager_staff_id = st.staff_id
JOIN
    rental r ON s.store_id = r.store_id
JOIN
    payment p ON r.rental_id = p.rental_id
WHERE
    YEAR(r.rental_date) = 2006
GROUP BY
    s.store_id
ORDER BY
    total_nilai_pembayaran DESC;
```
